homepage.heading: Newsletter Platform

letter.p1: Most newsletter platforms today track and profile your readers by default. They collect data on who opened your emails, what links they clicked, and sometimes even where they opened the email from. They undermine the very essence of privacy.
letter.p2: Hyvor Post, by design, does not include any tracking features. You can confidently send newsletters without invading your readers' privacy. Your readers can confidently subscribe to your newsletters without worrying about being watched.
letter.p3: Many platforms are overloaded with features you'll never need. They often come with complex interfaces, making it difficult to focus on what really matters: your content. Hyvor Post is designed to be refreshingly simple and straightforward. You can fully focus on writing and sending awesome newsletters!
